headline: Is McCormick (MKC) Pricing Reflect Its DCF Upside And Paris Hilton Partnership Hype
summary: If you are wondering whether McCormick at around US$71 is a bargain or just fairly priced, this breakdown will help you frame that question clearly before you make any moves. The stock has had a mixed run, with a 3.7% return over the last week and 14.8% over the last month, set against a 5.6% return year to date, a 4.5% return over 3 years, and declines of 11.8% over 1 year and 6.7% over 5 years. Recent coverage of McCormick has focused on how the share price has behaved through different...
